messages.title: A Record of Delivery.
messages.content: 2010-2015: Cut the deficit by half, £1,200 tax cut for low and middle earners, 1 Million jobs and 2 Million apprenticeships created, Pupil Premium for disadvantaged children, Increased mental health spending, Guaranteed Yearly Pension raises.

messages.title: A Promise of More.
messages.content: Fight to the last to balance the books, Put £400 a year back into your pocket, Boost NHS frontline worker numbers, Guaranteed yearly rises in pension and close tax loopholes benefiting the wealthiest.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to the last to balance the books, and put £400 a year back into your pocket.
Guaranteed yearly rises in pension and close tax loopholes benefiting the wealthiest.

mentions.candidate: Matthew Winnington lives and works in South-East Hampshire and understands the issues that matter most to the people of Fareham

issues.economy: Fight to the last to balance the books, and put £400 a year back into your pocket.
issues.socialWelfare: Guaranteed yearly rises in pension and close tax loopholes benefiting the wealthiest.

images.caption: Matthew Winnington, Liberal Democrat candidate for Fareham

leaflet.additionalNotes: 3 general reasons to vote for Matthew Winnington: LOCAL - Matthew lives and works in South-East Hampshire and understands the issues that matter most to the people of Fareham. EXPERIENCED - A councillor in one of our neighbouring wards, Matthew has a proven track record of getting things done. A WINNER - Nearly 1,000 fewer votes needed to win than in the neighbouring Portsmouth South, where we beat the tories.
